mainHero.title: Merideo
mainHero.description: Saving you time and and enabling you to experience new cuisines by connecting you with authentic cooks in your community.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Browse our website to discover new cuisines and pick your meals for the week. You can also learn about the people behind the food in their bio and speak to them about your unique preferences and needs. Choose your delivery slot and have your food delivered to you at your convenience.

items.title: Customer User Journey
items.descriptionOne: Preparing home-cooked food for the week can take a long time and might be the last thing you want to do when you come home from work. “We're having pasta bolognese, again?” - we've all been there...
items.descriptionTwo: There are talented chefs in your community who are keen to share their amazing home-cooked meals with you, help you prepare food for the week to come, and enable you to experience new cuisines all at the same time.

items.title: Cook User Journey
items.descriptionOne: We enable cooks to prepare authentic and varied meals from the comfort of their own home, share their culture with others and become financially independent.
items.descriptionTwo: Are you passionate about making authentic food?

steps.alt: Step One: Register for an account
Step Two: Pick a cuisine you want to try
Step Five: Wait for your meals to be delivered!
Step Two: Submit a sample for quality control along with a menu proposal
Step Three: Get licensing with local council and obtain hygiene certificate
Step Four: Set up your profile , including menu, bio, availability
Step Five: Hold tight for orders!
Step Six: Prepare food, pack, and hand over

features.title: About Us
features.description: We’re two friends who met at King's College London and are passionate about entrepreneurship. We want to give people a platform to connect and bond over food.

items.name: Tereza Rusova
items.description: Economist by background, I am passionate about food, connecting people and celebrating diversity. As a Londoner, I love how diverse my home is and want to enable people to experience new cuisines.

items.name: Atheer Musa
items.description: I’m a software engineer. I’m passionate about building products that empower people and enrich their lives.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
